topic.title: Crashed on My Mac OS X Computer

section.title: Problem
section.p: crashed the Apple Java virtual machine/ could not start up on my OS X computer due to a JVM crash. What can I do?

section.title: Solution
section.p: Usually it is an incompatibility between the Apple JVM and a native library of the host system. More details are available in the crash log file generated by OS X and reported in the crash error message.
